page.title: 021st. BROUGHSHANE PRES. CH.
page.content: First Broughshane Presbyterian Church was founded in 1655 and the first minister was the {Rev. John {Douglas. In 1920 the original church was showing signs of wear and tear so the congregation decided to repair and enlarge the building.The new church was completed and ready for occupation in July,1931.Today the church serves 325 families and the minister is the { {Rev. Porter.} The church organ which is 57 yrs. old was presented to the church by the Wilson family of the Knockan. One service is held every Sunday at 12.00 noon and one on alternate Sundays at 6.00 p.m. The church hall is used by the Girls' Brigade, Bowling Club, Badminton Club, P.W.A. and the Sunday School.
